featured.text: What is the main idea of the third paragraph? (A) Proper social behavior must be observed by prom-goers.
Therefore, proms have been held every year in high schools for students to learn proper social behavior.
In our proper relationship with others, we will be known and seen for who we are, and love will come out of the seeing and the knowing.
What’s the proper way of wearing the kilt? (A) It should be worn with underwear underneath it.
You will also learn important information about __(24)__ for fresh and inexpensive foods, the use of herbs and spices, and the proper ways of storing different kinds of food.

definition.zh_def: 適當的，合適的，符合規範的
definition.en_def: Suitable or appropriate; conforming to established standards or rules.
definition.example: It is important to wear proper attire for the formal event.
